entry.title: Child Abduction Emergency issued June 15 at 11:26PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Tennessee Bureau of Investigation. An AMBER Alert has been issued on behalf of the Blount County Sheriff`s Office for Alexis Byrn. Alexis is a 14-year-old white female, 5 feet 3 inches tall 180 pounds, with brown hair and blue eyes. Alexis was last seen in Blount County, TN on June 12, 2022.
